title: Basic User making a request in Home Venue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Basic user in TEX.
custom_steps:
WHEN
On Request/Transfer Tickets page.
AND Start Date = 09/01/2019 and End Date = 09/30/2019
AND click on 'Request' button for Sept 27th Game.
AND user enters data in all the mandatory fields (First Name, Last Name, Relation=Family, Available Section = pick ‘SecH1@$10”', select Quantity as '1' and Pickup Location = PickupH1)
AND once the 'Submit Request' gets enable after filling out all the mandatory fields, click on the Submit Request button
custom_expected:
THEN
A 'Save Ticket Request' message in green color is shown and a successful reservation is created for that specific date

title: Basic User making a request in an Away Venue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Basic user in TEX.
custom_steps:
WHEN
On Request/Transfer Tickets page.
AND Start Date = 09/01/2019 and End Date = 09/30/2019
AND click on 'Request' button for Sept 22nd Game.
AND user enters data in all the mandatory fields (First Name, Last Name, Relation=Family, Available Section = pick ‘SecA1@$20”', select Quantity as '1' and Pickup Location = PickupA1)
AND once the 'Submit Request' gets enable after filling out all the mandatory fields, click on the Submit Request button
custom_expected:
THEN
A 'Save Ticket Request' message in green color is shown and a successful reservation is created for that specific date

title: Creating a request On Behalf of Another user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as an Admin user in TEX.
custom_steps:
WHEN
On Request/Transfer Tickets page.
AND Start Date = 09/01/2019 and End Date = 09/30/2019
AND click on 'Request' button for Sept 27th Game.
AND under the Request On Behalf Of:  select the username as AutomationB, Basic
AND enters data in all the mandatory fields (First Name, Last Name, Relation=Family, Available Section = pick ‘SecH1@$10”', select Quantity as '1' and Pickup Location = PickupH1)
AND once the 'Submit Request' gets enable after filling out all the mandatory fields, click on the Submit Request button
custom_expected:
THEN
A 'Save Ticket Request' message in green color is shown and a successful reservation is created for that specific date

title: Global users can override quantity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global User
custom_steps:
WHEN
Select TEX in the org dropdown at the top right  corner.
AND Click on Admin 
AND click on Venue
AND click on Edit icon for the venue named ‘Globe Life Park in Arlington’
AND under the Ticket Inventory, for section named SecH1, under the # of Seats, change the value from 20 to 30
AND click on Save.
custom_expected:
THEN
A green color message, Venue Updated is displayed. And on front end the ticket quantity limit will be increased.

title: Admins and Basic users cannot go over quantity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Basic/Admin user in TEX.
custom_steps:
WHEN
On Request/Transfer Tickets page.
AND Start Date = 09/01/2019 and End Date = 09/30/2019
AND click on 'Request' button for Sept 27th Game.
AND user enters data in all the mandatory fields (First Name, Last Name, Relation=Family, Available Section = pick ‘SecH1@$10”', select Quantity as '1' and Pickup Location = PickupH1)
custom_expected:
THEN 
The Quantity dropdown is showing the exact X number as is shown in red color, “X tickets remaining”

The value in  list of Quantity dropdown cannot go over that limit as shown in the red color next to Quantity.

title: Update amount cannot break inventory rules
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global User
custom_steps:
WHEN
Select TEX in the org dropdown at the top right  corner.
AND Click on Admin 
AND click on Venues
AND click on Edit icon for the venue named ‘Globe Life Park in Arlington’
AND under the Ticket Inventory, for section named SecH1, change the Price 
AND click on Save.
custom_expected:
THEN
Venue Updated message is displayed and the new price will be reflected on the front end for the user when the user go to Request ticket page.

title: Update overrides
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global User
custom_steps:
WHEN
Select TEX in the org dropdown at the top right  corner.
AND Click on Admin 
AND click on Venue
AND click on Edit icon for the venue named ‘Globe Life Park in Arlington’
AND under the Ticket Inventory, for section named SecH1, for the # of Seats, change the value from 20 to 30 and for Price, change the price.
AND click on Save.
custom_expected:
THEN 
Venue updated message in green color is displayed and the this changes will be reflecting on the front end for the users

title: Import Inventory
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global User
custom_steps:
WHEN
Select TEX in the org dropdown at the top right  corner.
AND Click on Admin 
AND click on Venue
AND click on Edit icon for the venue named ‘Globe Life Park in Arlington’
AND for the Season selected as= “2019 Regular Season”
AND click on the “Import” button at the bottom right corner
AND a new “Import From Previous Season” window pops up, select any previous season for which data exists in the system and check mark the Pickup Locations
AND click on Import
custom_expected:
THEN 
all the inventory data related to the selection is imported.

title: Labels
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global/Admin User
custom_steps:
WHEN
AND Click on Reports
AND click on Event Reservations
AND enter the begin and end date as 05/21/2019 and 09/30/2019
AND click on 09/27
AND click on the Export
AND click on “Labels”
custom_expected:
THEN:
Label report is in pdf form is generated and the data is matching to what ever is seen on the UI.

title: Full Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global/Admin User
custom_steps:
WHEN
AND Click on Reports
AND click on Event Reservations
AND enter the begin and end date as 05/21/2019 and 09/30/2019
AND click on 09/27 event
AND click on the Export
AND click on “Export to Excel”
custom_expected:
THEN:
Full Excel report is in xls form is generated and the data is matching to what ever is seen on the UI.

title: Box Office
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global/Admin User
custom_steps:
WHEN
AND Click on Reports
AND click on Event Reservations
AND enter the begin and end date as 05/21/2019 and 09/30/2019
AND click on 09/27 event
AND click on the Export
AND click on “Box Office Report”
custom_expected:
THEN:

title: Export Settings - Orgs can have different order and fields based on export settings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
User is signed in, as a Global/Admin User
custom_steps:
WHEN
AND TEX is selected in ORG drop
AND Click on Reports
AND click on Event Reservations
AND click on the Export
AND under Labels, sort the order the Display Info field as: ‘Recipient’, ‘Requester’, ‘Quantity’, ‘Pickup Location’.
AND under the Box Office, sort the order as ‘Recipient’, ‘Requester’, ‘Department’, ‘Quantity’
AND click on Save, Save Export Setting message is displayed. 
AND when the ORG dropdown is changed again to a different team, ‘WAS’
AND under the Labels, sort the order of Display Info field as: ‘Relation’, ‘Department’, ‘Recipeint’, ‘Section’
AND under the Box Office change the Display Info as: ‘Pickup Location’, ‘Section’, ’Requester’, ‘’Comments’
AND clicked on ‘Save’
custom_expected:
THEN:
WHEN Reports are generated for both ORG. The Report will have different types of fields based on the export settings.
